mapper.sql: select a.apply_id, a.applicant_id, a.room_id,a.dept_id, a.apply_type, a.apply_reason, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.apply_status, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.del_flag, a.remark,a.approval_user_id,a.approve_status, a.female_num , a.male_num , a.single_room_num , a.standard_room_num , d.dept_name, r.room_num, u2.user_name as applicant, u2.sex as applicant_sex from umap_apply_info a left join sys_user u2 on a.applicant_id = u2.user_id left join sys_dept d on a.dept_id = d.dept_id left join umap_back_up_room r on a.room_id = r.room_id

select a.apply_id, a.apply_type, a.apply_reason, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.apply_status, a.create_time, u2.user_name as applicant, u2.sex as applicantSex,a.approve_status, d.dept_name, r.room_num from umap_apply_info a left join sys_user u2 on a.applicant_id = u2.user_id left join sys_dept d on a.dept_id = d.dept_id left join umap_back_up_room r on a.room_id = r.room_id
mapper.select: SELECT room_id FROM umap_apply_info WHERE #{startTime} < start_time AND #{endTime} > start_time AND #{endTime} <= end_time AND room_id is not null AND apply_status != 6 AND del_flag = 0 GROUP BY room_id UNION SELECT room_id FROM umap_apply_info WHERE #{startTime} >= start_time AND #{endTime} >= start_time AND #{endTime} <= end_time AND room_id is not null AND apply_status != 6 AND del_flag = 0 GROUP BY room_id UNION SELECT room_id FROM umap_apply_info WHERE #{startTime} >= start_time AND #{startTime} < end_time AND #{endTime} > end_time AND room_id is not null AND apply_status != 6 AND del_flag = 0 GROUP BY room_id
select count(1) as 'applyNumber' from umap_apply_info a where a.del_flag = '0' and a.apply_status in (0, 1)
select count(1) as 'applyNumber' from umap_apply_info a where a.del_flag = '0' and a.apply_status in (0, 1) and a.start_time = #{startTime}

select a.applicant_id, u.user_name as userName, d.dept_name as deptName, count(1) as applyNumber from umap_apply_info a left join sys_user u on a.applicant_id = u.user_id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id where a.start_time >= #{startTime} and a.start_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY a.applicant_id, u.user_name, d.dept_name order by count(1) desc
